message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be willing to accommodate this price?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $150 is my bottom line. This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it.
